title: [1.16.4-1.7.10][Reliquary——圣遗物]源于自然，高于自然
author: 琉璃楓夕陽
txt_content:
本帖最后由 琉璃楓夕陽 于 2021-1-7 21:19 编辑 







本帖更新记录：
2019年2月2日发帖，本帖参与了搬运悬赏令。
2019年2月20日更新了1.3.4.786，由于事务繁忙暂时不能翻译更新记录，几日后会补完。
2019年3月3日补完更新记录汉化。
2019年10月13日更新1.3.4.796.
2021年1月7日更新1.3.4.1061。这个作者居然复活了，于是我也复活了。还有为啥这个帖子被锁了。攒了好多更新记录，慢慢翻译，最近还要学日语。
Mod更新记录：
1.3.4.1061
Fixed crash when crafting spawn eggs from charm fragments on dedicated server (client side only method was used previously which caused the crash there)
1.3.4.1055
Fixed mob charm belt shift click issues
Fixed zombified piglin charm fragment recipe
1.3.4.1051
Fixed stakoverflow when either mob charm or twilight cloak were used with Piglin.
1.3.4.1048
Fixed charm and fragment jei descriptions (and stopped related errors in log)
Fixed dedicated server crash with holy hand grenade explosion
1.3.4.1042
Added functionality that makes all hostile mobs drop charm fragments with a pretty low chance - only applies to those that don't have fragment crafting recipes
Added fragment to spawn egg crafting recipe
1.3.4.1039
Fixes effect names in potion tooltips
Fixes issues related to incorrect implementation of getContainerItem in VoidTear
1.3.4.1018 和上一个一样
Fixed JEI potion recipes - correct recipe is lingering potion in the middle surrounded with ammo
Fixed giving player empty potion vial after drinking one of the potions
Fixed alkahestry tome to not stack
Change to BlockItemUseContext use to include player to prevent crashes of mods that don't handle nullable player in the context properly
1.3.4.1009
Fixed JEI potion recipes - correct recipe is lingering potion in the middle surrounded with ammo
Fixed giving player empty potion vial after drinking one of the potions
Fixed alkahestry tome to not stack
Change to BlockItemUseContext use to include player to prevent crashes of mods that don't handle nullable player in the context properly
1.3.4.1015
Fixed alkahestry tome to not stack
Change to BlockItemUseContext use to include player to prevent crashes of mods that don't handle nullable player in the context properly
Fixed drinkable potions to yet again apply potion effects to the player
1.3.4.1002
1.16.3. port
1.3.4.994 和上一个一样
Fixed loot table addition for snow golems so that these drop frozen cores again.
1.3.4.995
Fixed loot table addition for snow golems so that these drop frozen cores again.
1.3.4.991 和上一个一样
Fixes issues with seeds becoming bonemeal in harvest rod.
Fixes hardness of pedestals.
1.3.4.987
Fixes issues with seeds becoming bonemeal in harvest rod.
Fixes hardness of pedestals.
1.3.4.984 嗯对和上一个是一样的
Fixes crash connected to pumping seeds into harvest rod through pedestal.
Also fixes client side counts of bonemeal and seeds contained in the harvest rod which didn't update on removal of harvest rod from pedestal.
1.3.4.978
Fixes crash connected to pumping seeds into harvest rod through pedestal.
Also fixes client side counts of bonemeal and seeds contained in the harvest rod which didn't update on removal of harvest rod from pedestal.
1.3.4.969 为啥顺序是反的？因为这个是1.14.4版，而不是1.15.2
Added back in renders for empty void and infernal tears
Added packets to angelheart vial and phoenix down to properly spawn particles on client.
Fixed mob charm belt recipe
Fixed issues with Harvest rod consuming the last plantable seed and then crashing.
Fixed tooltip of reliquary potions
Fixed void tear crash when an empty one is clicked on the ground
Fixed warnings in log related to checking curios inventory for non curios items.
Some settings fixes to not allow "worth" values that break the game.
Fixed alkahestry altar light.
Removed culling from wraith node model so that sides don't become invisible.
1.3.4.972
Fixed mob charm belt recipe
Fixed issues with Harvest rod consuming the last plantable seed and then crashing.
Some settings fixes to not allow "worth" values that break the game.
Adding null check to code that attaches capabilities because some mods are nasty and create itemstacks for non registered items.
1.3.4.960
Fixes void tear crash when an empty one is clicked on the ground and anonther when an enabled filled one has a creative inventory open on it.
修复虚空之泪在空的点击地面时有另一个开启的存有物品的虚空之泪开启时的崩溃。
Fixes warnings in log related to checking curios inventory for non curios items.
修复了log中关于非Curios物品检查Curios装备栏的问题
Adds back in renders for empty void and infernal tears
加入了对空虚空之泪和炼狱之泪的后方(?)(back in)渲染
1.3.4.957
1.15.2 port including JEI and Curios compatibility
更新至1.15.2，包含JEI和Curios支持
1.3.4.947
Port of Reliquary to 1.14.4 with compatibility with JEI and Curios
更新版本至1.14.4 并保有完整的JEI和Curios支持
1.3.4.796
Hotfix for the previous release, fixing a crash related to charm code.
对于上个版本的热更新，修复了一个关于密码(charm code)的崩溃。
Fixed an issue with rending gale crashing game sometimes because it tried to spawn way too many particles (well infinite number of these)
修复了一个裂风者的bug，它会产生无限的粒子并有时会导致游戏崩溃
Fixed mob charm crashes for some entities - revenge target reset during set target handling caused NPE in follow up AI call so instead now the revenge target is set during regular entity update to not interfere with AI logic.修复了部分怪物实体的崩溃--攻击目标被重置后导致触发AI导致NPE，所以现在复仇目标会按照普通的实体更新来避免干扰AI逻辑。
Bullets that seek entities updated to stop them from hanging around a mob that already plays death animation and move onto the next instead. (Thanks to Corosauce for this change)
追踪子弹不再会在已经被打死的怪物旁边晃来晃去而是去找新的怪物。（感谢Corosauce）
Changed death handling items to use LivingDeathEvent instead of trying to calculate if player would die in attack event. Fixes conflict of these items with health scaling effects like absorbtion where it previously incorrectly used their effects even when player would have survived.
改变了死亡时物品持有的显示方式，现在会用LivingDeathEvent而不是试图计算玩家是在攻击时死亡。修复了一些有恢复效果如伤害吸收效果的物品的冲突，它们之前会在玩家存活时错误地使用其效果。
1.3.4.786
Added setting to allow turning off stealing from players with Rod of Lyssa
加入了关闭犬牙钓竿盗窃其他玩家东西的设置
Added player to loot context in Rod of Lyssa to allow getting player specific stuff
加入了对犬牙钓竿抢夺的介绍来使玩家能知晓这个功能。
Added several options to be able to disable stuff (Thanks Lothrazar)
加入了关闭以下几个东西的设置（感谢Lothrazar）
- potion system
药水系统
- alkahestry
万物溶剂之经
- handgun
手枪
Improvements to Lantern of Paranoia placement mechanics (Thanks duely)
改进了偏执灯笼的放置原理（感谢 duely）
- will now place light on blocks below the set
现在会给予底座下的方块光照。
light level regardless of sky light. This allows the item to be used
光照等级与天空亮度无关。这使得该物品可以起效。
efficiently during the day.
在白天有效。
- will attempt to place torches on replaceable, non-liquid blocks in
将会尝试再可以被替换的非流体方块放置火把。
addition to air blocks. This allows the lantern to be used in snowy
加入了空气方块。这使得灯笼能在雪天使用。
areas without too much of a malus.
没有特别多的苹果的地方。（？）
Fixed void tear block placement with right click
修复了虚空之泪方块的右键放置
Fixed issue with sky turning white when charm hud is displayed
修复了当魔法界面开启时天空变白的问题
1.3.4.780
Converted almost all of IInventory code over to IItemHandler code, so now everything in Reliquary that works with inventories should support all modded ones (unless someone decided not to use item handlers at all).
将所有使用IInventory接口的代码改成了使用IItemHandler接口，所以现在圣遗物所有带库存的物品都应该支持其他mod的背包和箱子一类的带库存物品，除非那些mod的作者不用IItemHandler(感谢柚子头的纠正)
Added tooltip rendering to mob charm belt GUI. 
给护符腰带的GUI增加了使用提示。
Cleaned up and improved performance of midas touchstone and added gold hoe to the list of items repaired by default.清理并增强了试金石的表现并使它能修复金锄头。
Fixed witch hat that was floating above player's head when sneaking (PR from Managarmr719)
修复了巫女帽在玩家潜行时在头顶浮动。（Managarmr719的Pull Request）








[groupid=1645]Nuclear Fusion[/groupid]

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
Converted almost all of IInventory code over to IItemHandler code, so now everything in Reliquary that works with inventories should support all modded ones (unless someone decided not to use item handlers at all).
意为"将所有使用IInventory接口的代码改成了使用IItemHandler接口（IItemHandler是一个管物品容器的接口），所以现在reliquary里所有带库存的物品都应该支持其他mod的背包和箱子一类的带库存物品，除非那些mod的作者不用IItemHandler"。
接口的名字最好不要翻译，因为这是代码。

replies.author: 琉璃楓夕陽
replies.txt_content:
森林蝙蝠 发表于 2019-2-2 23:39
Converted almost all of IInventory code over to IItemHandler code, so now everything in Reliquary th ...
好的，我回去就去改
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

本帖最后由 146780128 于 2019-2-6 15:26 编辑

replies.txt_content:
146780128 发表于 2019-2-6 15:22
楼主，我这边测试出一个问题，携带僵尸护符时用剑横扫僵尸和小白游戏会直接出错一下是VF原版修复的错误报告 ...
请不要把错误报告放在这里，因为我也不会解决这样的问题...
可以到问答板问一下具体原因
看见圣遗物就想起崩坏3emmmmmm我是不是没救了
